definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)

sentences.english: However, all the figures have yet to come home braving persons.
sentences.chinese: 然而，所有的數字家園掘金者至今尚未如願以償。

sentences.english: A wealthy man fruitfully married a beautiful female movie star.
sentences.chinese: 一名富翁如願以償地娶到了一位美麗的女影星。

sentences.english: When the gods wish to punish us, we must first make our prayers.
sentences.chinese: 若諸神要懲罰我等，必先讓我等如願以償。

sentences.english: But it is not distributed as they would like.
sentences.chinese: 但是其分配方式未能如願以償。

sentences.english: Fear is the one main reason that holds us back from getting what we want.
sentences.chinese: 畏懼感是阻礙我們如願以償的主要原因。

sentences.english: After the university graduates, emerald green flower achieves what one wishes marry Chen Zhi.
sentences.chinese: 大學畢業後，翠花如願以償的嫁給陳志。

sentences.english: The couple finally married last month in Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 上個月，這對情侶終於如願以償在愛丁堡舉行婚禮。

sentences.english: Well the woman almost got her wish.
sentences.chinese: 這回她總算是如願以償了。

sentences.english: Today, I finally achieved what I wished and arrived at Dabancheng.
sentences.chinese: 初夏裏的一天，我終於如願以償，來到達坂城。

sentences.english: Whether they can and got a large number of gold then?
sentences.chinese: 他們是否能如願以償地得到大批的黃金呢？

sentences.english: And once again, the economy will be held captive unless they get their way.
sentences.chinese: 美國經濟將再一次被用作質押，除非他們如願以償。

sentences.english: But they also fruitfully had attained today the key three points.
sentences.chinese: 而今天他們也如願以償地拿到了關鍵的三分。

sentences.english: 19】, When n gods wish to punish us, they answer our prayer.
sentences.chinese: 若諸神要懲罰我等，必先讓我等如願以償。

sentences.english: Although not satisfied, but admitted the undergraduate program.
sentences.chinese: 雖然沒有如願以償的考上大學部，但是。

sentences.english: And suddenly she can actually see color as well.
sentences.chinese: 突然間她如願以償地看到了色彩。

sentences.english: For the wish to come true, it must be kept secret.
sentences.chinese: 爲了如願以償，許願者絕不能把願望告訴別人。

definition: to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
lit. to return to office after living as a hermit on Mount Dongshan (idiom); fig. to make a comeback
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
to be eager to give sth a try (idiom)
to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
to adjust one's head and turn one's face (idiom); cosmetic changes/Despite superficially new policies, the substance remains unchanged.
